title: Passing the baton on
creator_credit: Margot Firth-Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: While Margot Firth-Smith’s beloved father returned from the war, he came back a very old man and died soon after. To fill the gap, Firth-Smith joined Legacy which set her off on a rewarding life helping others.
creator_credit_for_label: Margot Firth-Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
